# NextCV - Professional AI Resume Builder

NextCV is a specialized, ATS-optimized AI resume builder tailored for the Indian job market. It focuses on providing high-quality, professional resumes for a one-time affordable fee (₹100) without recurring subscriptions.

- Website: https://www.nextcv.in
- Pricing: ₹100 per AI resume (One-time payment)
- Key Features: ATS-friendly templates, AI-powered content generation, Freshers-focused designs.

## Core Services

- **ATS-Optimized Resumes:** Every template is tested against Applicant Tracking Systems to ensure high readability for recruiters.
- **AI Content Generation:** Users can generate professional summaries and bullet points using integrated AI.
- **Indian Market Focus:** Specifically designed with Indian industry standards and formatting in mind.
- **Free Demo:** Users can preview their resume with a live editor before making a payment.

## Technical Specifications

- **Output Format:** High-quality, white-labeled PDFs.
- **Pricing Model:** Pay-per-resume (No hidden subscriptions).
- **Target Audience:** Job seekers in India, fresh graduates, and experienced professionals looking for ATS-verified templates.

## Important Links

- [Resume Templates](https://www.nextcv.in/templates)
- [Pricing & Payment](https://www.nextcv.in/pricing)
- [Contact Support](https://www.nextcv.in/contact)
